description: This file defines a UI component named 'Button' using the LightningJS framework. The component toggles a favorited state and updates its displayed text accordingly. It includes a template with dynamic content and handles input events to toggle state.

classes.name: Button
classes.description: A LightningJS component that displays a button which toggles its favorited state when the Enter key is pressed.

methods.name: input.enter
methods.description: Handles the Enter key press to toggle the 'isFavorited' state.
